name: Spin Into The Bin
description:
Spin Into The Bin is a fun simple game that only uses 2 controls to be able to play. Your left and right arrow keys. Your goal is to make sure that your paper ally falls safely into the place they belong - the trashcan. There are many obstacles along the way that are certainly going to make some people think its a rage game. Which we're not saying it's not ;) 

Update plans:

- Bring the game out on android with tilt controls

- Introduce new levels

- introduce narration

- improve graphics, sounds and vfx

We're hoping to get all the feedback possible, whether positive or negative - We do listen!

Credits:

- Nastiya Kamiakova - Visuals

- Jonas de Martelaere - Level & Game design

- Czarek Mildner - Programming
